QuestData.Title: Staging in Brewnall
QuestData.Description: While High Tinker Mekkatorque, his military advisors, and I finalize the plans for the attack on Razlo Crushcog, I've sent my assistant ahead to Brewnall Village to begin preparations.$B$BTo get to Brewnall Village, follow the road southeast out of town. Once you arrive, find Jarvi Shadowstep and see if he needs any help. Our dwarven cousins have dispatched a cadre of mountaineers from Ironforge to join us in the fight against Crushcog.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Jarvi Shadowstep at Brewnall Village.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Jarvi Shadowstep at Brewnall Village.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, yes, Kelsey told me to expect you. There's still much to do before we can take on Crushcog.
